description: Describes the specified EC2 Mac Dedicated Host or all of your EC2 Mac Dedicated Hosts.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. availability-zone - The Availability Zone of the EC2 Mac Dedicated Host. instance-type - The instance type size that the EC2 Mac Dedicated Host is configured to support. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

parameters.name: HostIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the EC2 Mac Dedicated Hosts. (string) ---

nested_items.name: MacHosts
nested_items.description: Information about the EC2 Mac Dedicated Hosts.

nested_items.name: HostId
nested_items.description: The EC2 Mac Dedicated Host ID.

nested_items.name: MacOSLatestSupportedVersions
nested_items.description: The latest macOS versions that the EC2 Mac Dedicated Host can launch without being upgraded.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results.
